Tell them to try it out See you all with a new recipe

audio_description: I've noticed that some people do not add oil in the beginning itself.But when I tried it like that,I felt that the raw smell of ginger,garlic and green chillies will be gone for a long time That's why I've sauted it with some oil If you want it to be oil free,you can saute it with the tomato first and then add ginger,green chilli,garlic and then saute it with the onion When you saute it in the oil,the raw smell will be gone very fast
